ygData.subject: Re: Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: ... How do you know your skill went up if it didn t show any numbers? Does it say below average in the skill window still? If it does that means you didn t
ygData.messageBody:
>Well I am getting my skill up even if it hasnt shown any numbers... I found
>that the Cams are just the right level to be making at first when you start
>tinkering...Being a gnome seems to have its advantages and I must say the
>first to find the recipes to find the recipes to the gnome
>fireworks,fishing
>pole ,and the infared goggles will be a rich gnome indeed.

How do you know your skill went up if it didn't show any numbers?
Does it say "below average" in the skill window still? If it does that means
you didn't gain skill.
Maybe it's just me who can't raise skill.

-Catbik Tinkerton
